column4: Ive been running WoW through wine no problem mainly beacuse it was a paste/copy directory (did not install). But i have recently installed games via wine FF7 (pc) and Ultima Online. The problem is when i try to start either of these games i either get a out of memory error from UO or a swap error. I have been on gparted and made sure swap was enabled, configured wine, and still nothing, any light on this would be greatly appr
For comparison, WoW has platinum and gold ratings
